channel.title: Help please read it
channel.description:
i dont wanna use hamachi :)
im gonna ask a few questions
1. if i use hamachi do i have to share the source with my friends? 2. if i use hamachi where can i paste my ip (if i need) into my client
1. i got no-ip but i cant port forward becuz i dont know the pass if i use no-ip do i need to port forward?
